data.text: Pak Jehova Nyasaye, yaye chunya.
Oumore gi ler mana kaka nanga; oyaro polo mana kaka hema
kendo ogero ode moluore ewi pi.
Omiyo yembe bedo kaka jootene,
Iseguro piny e mise mage;
Ne iume gi kut mana kaka nanga
To kane ikwero pigego to ne gileny nono,
ne gimol ewi gode,
Ne iketonegi tongʼ ma ok ginyal kadho;
Jehova Nyasaye miyo sokni olo pi
Gichiwo pi ne le mag bungu duto;
Winy mafuyo e kor polo ogero utegi e bath pigego,
Omiyo koth chue ewi gode koa e dalane manie polo;
Omiyo lum loth ne jamni,
kaachiel gi divai mamoro chuny dhano,
Yiende Jehova Nyasaye yudo pi moromogi,
Kanyo ema winy geroe utegi,
Diek mag bungu odak e gode maboyo,
Dwe pogo kinde mag chwiri gi kinde mag opon
Ikelo mudho mi piny lokre otieno,
Sibuoche ruto ka gimanyo chiemo;
To ka chiengʼ wuok to gidok e bungu;
Eka dhano wuok oko chako tijene,
Mano kaka gik michweyo ngʼeny, yaye Jehova Nyasaye!
Isechweyo nam maduongʼ kendo malach
Kuno ema meli kwangʼie koni gi koni,
In ema gigo duto ngʼiyi
Ka imiyogi chiemo, to gichamo;
ka ipando wangʼi, to githagore;
Ka ioro Roho mari, to gibedo mangima;
Mad duongʼ mar Jehova Nyasaye sik nyaka chiengʼ;
En e ma kongʼiyo piny to piny yiengni,
Abiro wer ne Jehova Nyasaye e ngimana duto,
Mad gik ma aparo e chunya omiye mor,
Joricho to owinjore orum e piny;
